snippet.title: “HOW Did YOU Hear About THIS POSITION?” (INTERVIEW QUESTION and TOP-SCORING ANSWER!)
snippet.description:
“HOW Did YOU Hear About THIS POSITION?” How to answer this COMMON INTERVIEW QUESTION! By Richard McMunn of:
https://passmyinterview.com/top-30-interview-questions-answers/
#jobinterviewtips #interviews #interviewquestionsandanswers

TIPS FOR ANSWERING THE INTERVIEW QUESTION: HOW Did YOU Hear About THIS POSITION?
TIP #1 - Show the interviewer that you have been interested in working for their company for some time.
TIP #2 - Tell the interviewer you had already prepared your resume in advance of the job being advertised.
TIP #3 - Tell the interviewer that you have followed their company on social media - this shows you have been interested in working for them for a long time and your decision to apply for the job is not based on impulse.

OTHER USEFUL INTERVIEW QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS VIDEOS ON YOUTUBE BY RICHARD MCMUNN:
Live Mock Interview Questions and Answers: https://youtu.be/KCm6JVtoRdo
Behavioral Interview Questions and Answers: https://youtu.be/ZLtO_7LjzVg

CONNECT WITH RICHARD ON LINKEDIN.COM:
https://www.linkedin.com/in/richard-mcmunn-coach/

DOWNLOAD THESE SLIDES AND RICHARD'S TOP 30 INTERVIEW QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS PDF GUIDE:
https://passmyinterview.com/top-30-interview-questions-answers/
